CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 链；链条；金属链；锁链；项链；一连串；一系列（人或物）；连成一行的人（或物）；连锁；山脉；联号；连锁店；连锁集团；连环式购房者；（~s）枷锁；镣铐；囚禁；束缚；（Chain）钱恩（姓氏）
用链条固定；用链条拴住；束缚；拘禁

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 束缚（chain的过去分词）；用链条系住

word_mean_info__list.difference: 专指用链条或金属环将某人或某物锁住或系住。
普通用词，指用绳索等将东西扎紧捆牢。
指将某物紧紧地固定起来，使之完全无损。
多指把两个或两个以上的人或物牢牢地系或扎在一起。
指把某物牢牢地拴在、钉在或锁在另一物上，使不能任意移动。

word_group.brief_definition: 链条中的一个环节；整个过程中的一个阶段
指挥系统；指挥链；行政管理系统
被铁链拴在一起的囚犯

bilingual.source: Here is an example of a food chain at sea.
bilingual.target: 这是一个海洋食物链的例子。

bilingual.source: Sharks are at the top of the food chain in the ocean's ecosystem.
bilingual.target: 鲨鱼在海洋生态系统的食物链顶端。

bilingual.source: Next in the food chain are zooplankton, which are very tiny animals.
bilingual.target: 食物链中的下一个是浮游动物，它们是非常微小的动物。

bilingual.source: Many believe that sharks can never be endangered because they are the strongest in their food chain.
bilingual.target: 许多人认为鲨鱼永远不会濒临灭绝，因为它们在食物链中最强。
他在一家连锁酒店工作。
他修好了自行车的链条。
这是一家新的咖啡连锁店。

bilingual.source: He is wearing a chain of keys.

bilingual.target: 我们参观了一个连锁超市。

list.abstract: chain（[tʃeɪn]），英语单词，作名词用，为链子；一连串；测链。作动词用，为用链条拴住。短语搭配有food chain（食物链），例句为“Relocate some of its chain stores.（搬迁它的一些连锁店）”。 chain名词类近义词有restriction、cord，及物动词类近义词有slave，相关反义词有unchain。
chain，发行于2012年2月22日，日本专辑。

yingyinNormal.en: Can we please just go in? My chain mail's stuck in my underwear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们快点进去好吗？我的锁子甲被夹在内裤里了。

yingyinNormal.en: Each dot you see here represents a single food outlet of a nationwide chain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里的每一个点，代表国内的一家食品商店。

yingyinNormal.en: I gotta check with the old ball and chain, but I'm good to go. Middle East me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要通知一下我家那位，不过肯定能去。中东，我来了。

yingyinNormal.en: All I got was a lousy key chain. And by that time I was living in a box. I didn't have keys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只收到一个烂钥匙环，拜托，我那时住在纸箱里耶，连钥匙都没有。

yingyinNormal.en: You know why they tell you that? Because once you have it, you rise to the top of the food chain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道为什么这么说吗？因为你一旦拥有它，就会登上食物链的顶端。

yingyinNormal.en: She is learning where she fits in the food chain and I'm not sure you want her to figure that out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她在找寻自己处于食物链的哪一环节，我认为你们不会希望她弄明白的。

yingyinNormal.en: These are no accidents. They're links in a chain. The work of a single organization, the Syndicate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那些都绝非偶然，它们由某个组织策划，环环相扣，这些都是辛迪加的杰作。

yingyinNormal.en: I was 4 years old. And I was on the swing and then all of a sudden my hair got tangled in the chain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我四岁荡秋千时，突然头发缠到铁链。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I lost that key chain years ago. Really? Did you look under things? Well, that is unfortunate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿…我的钥匙串早就丢了。真的吗？你有没有到处翻翻找找？真是太不幸了。

yingyinNormal.en: You really didn't think I'd notice my stuff was missing? Did you notice your key chain? Where's Batman?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的以为我不会发现我的东西不见了吗？你注意到你的钥匙链了吗？人家的蝙蝠侠呢？！

yingyinNormal.en: The chain! You try to eat me? Sorry. You should be sorry, you deserve being locked up. You're a bad bad bird!
yingyinNormal.zh: 死链子！你想吃我吗？抱歉。你应该感到抱歉，你就该被锁着，真是大坏鸟！

yingyinNormal.en: That's the best part. It's on the Batman flash drive on your key chain. You've had it in your pocket all along.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这才是最妙的部分。其实就在你钥匙串上的蝙蝠侠U盘里。一直都在你的口袋里呢。

yingyinNormal.en: No, we were annihilated by our own incompetence and the inability of some people to follow the chain of command.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我们的惨败是源于我们自己的无能，以及某些人没有能够听从指挥。

yingyinNormal.en: I will tie the sack onto the chain here, pull one of the two strings behind you and the sack should disappear up to the top floor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把袋子口绑在链子上，你身后有两条绳子，拉一条袋子就被拉上去了。

yingyinNormal.en: One job offer. From a very prominent hotel chain weighed against the implied offer of staying at my current job. Working for you dad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有一个。是一个著名的连锁酒店，我要在它和现在的工作之间权衡。现在的工作还是给你爸打工。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, don't, there's no need to cry. I'm sorry that I yelled at you before. Please take off the chain, this time I'll help you, I promise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别，没必要哭。我很抱歉刚才吼了你。请拿掉这链子，这次我会帮你，我保证。

yingyinNormal.en: But it isn't until we reached human beings at the top of the animal chain that we finally see a species use more of its cerebral capacity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直到人类出现，成为动物之王，终于有物种可以使用更多脑力。

yingyinNormal.en: Ew, that's like something out of a horror movie, like Bike of the Living Dead or Texas Bike Chain Massacre, or, well, that's probably enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感觉就是恐怖电影里的情节，比如《自行车活死人》或《德州自行车链杀人狂》，还有...算了，说够了。

yingyinNormal.en: Specifically, the interdepartmental tournament this weekend. In order to function better as a fighting unit, I thought we should establish a chain of command.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本周来点特别的，搞个不同部门间的比赛。为了变为更有效率的作战小队，我认为我们有必要建立一个领导机制。

yingyinNormal.en: The main feature of interest in the field of criminal investigation is not the sensational aspects of the crime itself, but rather the iron chain of reasoning, from cause to effect, that reveals, step by step, the solution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罪案调查中最引人入胜的部分并非耸人听闻的案件本身，而在于其严密的逻辑链。由因至果，进而一步步推理出答案。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 锁链; 链状物; 束缚

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of establishments, such as hotels, stores, or restaurants, owned by the same company

examination_example.sentence: Large American companies are much more globalized than ever before, with supply <highlight>chains</highlight> spread across a larger number of countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国大公司比以往任何时候都更加全球化，连锁店遍布更多的国家。

examination_example.sentence: Big <highlight>chains</highlight> have been collecting sales tax nationwide because they typically have physical stores in whatever state a purchase is being shipped to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大型连锁超市一直在全国范围内征收销售税，因为它们通常在进货运往的任何州都有实体店。

examination_example.sentence: The ruling is a victory for big <highlight>chains</highlight> with a presence in many states.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一裁决对于在许多州都有业务的大型连锁店来说是一个胜利。

sense_info_list.en: a series of connected links or ring, usually of metal
sense_info_list.zh: 锁链; 链状物; 束缚

examination_example.sentence: A broken bike <highlight>chain</highlight> is mentioned to show students' lack of practical ability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提到一条断裂的自行车链条是想说明学生缺乏动手能力。

examination_example.sentence: Students should be able to name the 13th president of the United States but be utterly overwhelmed by a broken bike <highlight>chain</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们本应能够说出美国第13任总统的名字，但却被一条断裂的自行车链条彻底迷惑了。

sense_info_list.en: a series of things depending on each other as if linked together

examination_example.sentence: "They are absolutely altering the food <highlight>chain</highlight> beyond what I think even they understand what they're doing."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “他们正在彻底改变食物链，我认为他们甚至不知道自己在做什么。”

word_usage.usage: chain作名词，表示“约束；束缚”时，常用复数形式，如：the chains of fear
chain作及物动词，其后可接名词或者代词，如：chain the door

exam_freq_info.chinese: 锁链; 链状物; 束缚

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a series of connected links or ring, usually of metal
sense_info_list.zh: 锁链; 链状物; 束缚

examination_example.sentence: Penguins, like other seabirds and marine mammals, occupy higher levels in the food <highlight>chain</highlight> and they are what we call bio-indicators of their ecosystems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企鹅与其他海鸟和海洋哺乳动物一样，在食物链中占据较高的位置，它们被称为其生态系统的生物指示器。

examination_example.sentence: They began to help other farmers convert from conventional to certified organic and grass-fed in order to enter the Maple Hill supply <highlight>chain</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们还开始帮助其他的农场主从传统转变到认证的有机草饲牛奶，以进入 Maple Hill 供应链。

examination_example.sentence: Allowing partners to work together on a specific aspect of the value <highlight>chain</highlight>, in this example, an engine firm with an accessory one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 允许合作伙伴在价值链的特定方面进行合作，就像这个例子中的一家发动机公司和一家配件公司的合作。

sense_info_list.en: a group of establishments, such as hotels, stores, or restaurants, owned by the same company
a series of things depending on each other as if linked together

examination_example.sentence: In 1924 he convinced the British government to encircle the world with a <highlight>chain</highlight> of wireless stations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1924年，他说服了英国政府用一连串的无线电站包围世界。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指把两个或两个以上的人或物牢牢地系或扎在一起。
专指用链条或金属环将某人或某物锁住或系住。
指把某物牢牢地拴在、钉在或锁在另一物上, 使不能任意移动。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 锁链; 链状物; 束缚

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of establishments; such as hotels; stores; or restaurants; owned by the same company

examination_example.sentence: And McDonald's wasn't alone in slowing down: Other <highlight>chains</highlight> also saw their drive-through performance slow down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 速度变慢的不止麦当劳一家：其他连锁店的得来速服务速度也有所减慢。

examination_example.sentence: Big fast food <highlight>chains</highlight> in New York City has started to obey a first-of-its-kind rule requiring them to post calorie counts right on the menu.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纽约的大型快餐连锁店已经开始遵守一项首创的规则，要求他们菜单上张贴卡路里计数。

examination_example.sentence: What are big fast food <highlight>chains</highlight> in New York City required to do according to the new rule?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据新规定，纽约的大型快餐连锁店需要做什么？

sense_info_list.en: a series of connected links or ring; usually of metal
sense_info_list.zh: 锁链; 链状物; 束缚

examination_example.sentence: They break up nature's food supply <highlight>chain</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们破坏了大自然的食物供应链。

examination_example.sentence: It could disrupt the food <highlight>chains</highlight> there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能会破坏那里的食物链。

examination_example.sentence: Over-hunting could lead to the disappearance of the whale population, possibly causing major problems to the global food <highlight>chain</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过度捕猎可能会导致鲸鱼数量的减少，这可能会给全球食物链带来重大问题。

sense_info_list.en: a series of things depending on each other as if linked together

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指把两个或两个以上的人或物牢牢地系或扎在一起。
专指用链条或金属环将某人或某物锁住或系住。
指把某物牢牢地拴在、钉在或锁在另一物上，使不能任意移动。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a series of connected links or ring, usually of metal

examination_example.sentence: I wish to have a <highlight>chain</highlight> of cafes in many different cities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我希望在许多不同的城市拥有连锁咖啡馆。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指把两个或两个以上的人或物牢牢地系或扎在一起。
专指用链条或金属环将某人或某物锁住或系住。
指把某物牢牢地拴在、钉在或锁在另一物上，使不能任意移动。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a series of connected links or ring, usually of metal

examination_example.sentence: Smaller plastic pieces can also enter the food <highlight>chain</highlight> (链) and end up in our bodies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 较小的塑料片也可以进入食物链，最终进入我们的身体。

examination_example.sentence: So why not set off that <highlight>chain</highlight> (链条) of good feelings to people around?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，为什么不向周围的人传递一系列美好的感情呢？
